Package edu.cornell.gdiac.json.gum

Class Bubblegum

java.lang.Object
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.Obstacle
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.SimpleObstacle
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.WheelObstacle
edu.cornell.gdiac.json.gum.Bubblegum
public class Bubblegum extends WheelObstacle
Class to represent a "stuck" Bubblegum. This Bubblegum is not a projectile; instead, it is instantiated when a gum projectile hits an Obstacle.
